016package io.micronaut.maven;
017
018import com.github.dockerjava.api.command.BuildImageCmd;
019import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.api.ImageReference;
020import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.api.InvalidImageReferenceException;
021import com.google.common.io.FileWriteMode;
022import io.micronaut.maven.core.MicronautRuntime;
023import io.micronaut.maven.services.ApplicationConfigurationService;
024import io.micronaut.maven.services.DockerService;
025import io.micronaut.maven.jib.JibConfigurationService;
026import io.micronaut.core.util.StringUtils;
027import org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession;
028import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecution;
029import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
030import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.Mojo;
031import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.ResolutionScope;
032import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
033import org.graalvm.buildtools.utils.NativeImageUtils;
034
035import javax.inject.Inject;
036import java.io.File;
037import java.io.IOException;
038import java.nio.charset.Charset;
039import java.nio.file.Files;
040import java.nio.file.Paths;
041import java.util.HashMap;
042import java.util.List;
043import java.util.Map;
044import java.util.Set;
045
046/**
047 * <p>Implementation of the <code>docker-native</code> packaging.</p>
048 * <p><strong>WARNING</strong>: this goal is not intended to be executed directly. Instead, specify the packaging type
049 * using the <code>packaging</code> property, eg:</p>
050 *
051 * <pre>mvn package -Dpackaging=docker-native</pre>
052 *
053 * @author Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal
054 * @author Iván López
055 * @since 1.1
056 */
057@Mojo(name = DockerNativeMojo.DOCKER_NATIVE_PACKAGING, requiresDependencyResolution = ResolutionScope.COMPILE_PLUS_RUNTIME)
058public class DockerNativeMojo extends AbstractDockerMojo {
059
060    public static final String DOCKER_NATIVE_PACKAGING = "docker-native";
061    public static final String MICRONAUT_PARENT = "io.micronaut:micronaut-parent";
062    public static final String MICRONAUT_VERSION = "micronaut.version";
063    public static final String ARGS_FILE_PROPERTY_NAME = "graalvm.native-image.args-file";
064
065    @SuppressWarnings("CdiInjectionPointsInspection")
066    @Inject
067    public DockerNativeMojo(MavenProject mavenProject, JibConfigurationService jibConfigurationService,
068                            ApplicationConfigurationService applicationConfigurationService, DockerService dockerService,
069                            MavenSession mavenSession, MojoExecution mojoExecution) {
070        super(mavenProject, jibConfigurationService, applicationConfigurationService, dockerService, mavenSession, mojoExecution);
071    }
072
073    @Override
074    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
075        checkJavaVersion();
076        checkGraalVm();
077
078        try {
079            copyDependencies();
080
081            MicronautRuntime runtime = MicronautRuntime.valueOf(micronautRuntime.toUpperCase());
082
083            switch (runtime.getBuildStrategy()) {
084                case LAMBDA -> buildDockerNativeLambda();
085                case ORACLE_FUNCTION -> buildOracleCloud();
086                case DEFAULT -> buildDockerNative();
087                default -> throw new IllegalStateException("Unexpected value: " + runtime.getBuildStrategy());
088            }
089
090
091        } catch (InvalidImageReferenceException iire) {
092            String message = "Invalid image reference "
093                    + iire.getInvalidReference()
094                    + ", perhaps you should check that the reference is formatted correctly according to " +
095                    "https://docs.docker.com/engine/reference/commandline/tag/#extended-description" +
096                    "\nFor example, slash-separated name components cannot have uppercase letters";
097            throw new MojoExecutionException(message);
098        } catch (IOException | IllegalArgumentException e) {
099            throw new MojoExecutionException(e.getMessage(), e);
100        }
101    }
102
103    private void checkGraalVm() throws MojoExecutionException {
104        String micronautVersion = mavenProject.getProperties().getProperty(MICRONAUT_VERSION);
105        if (mavenProject.hasParent()) {
106            String ga = mavenProject.getParent().getGroupId() + ":" + mavenProject.getParent().getArtifactId();
107            if (MICRONAUT_PARENT.equals(ga)) {
108                String micronautParentVersion = mavenProject.getModel().getParent().getVersion();
109                if (micronautVersion.equals(micronautParentVersion)) {
110                    if (!mavenProject.getInjectedProfileIds().get("io.micronaut:micronaut-parent:" + micronautParentVersion).contains("graalvm")) {
111                        String javaVendor = System.getProperty("java.vendor", "");
112                        if (javaVendor.toLowerCase().contains("graalvm")) {
113                            throw new MojoExecutionException("The [graalvm] profile was not activated automatically because the native-image component is not installed (or not found in your path). Either activate the profile manually (-Pgraalvm) or install the native-image component (gu install native-image), and try again");
114                        } else {
115                            throw new MojoExecutionException("The [graalvm] profile was not activated automatically because you are not using a GraalVM JDK. Activate the profile manually (-Pgraalvm) and try again");
116                        }
117                    }
118                } else {
119                    String message = String.format("The %s version (%s) differs from the %s property (%s). Please, make sure both refer to the same version", MICRONAUT_PARENT, micronautParentVersion, MICRONAUT_VERSION, micronautVersion);
120                    throw new MojoExecutionException(message);
121                }
122            } else {
123                getLog().warn("The parent POM of this project is not set to " + MICRONAUT_PARENT);
124            }
125        } else {
126            getLog().warn("This project has no parent POM defined. To avoid build problems, please set the parent to " + MICRONAUT_PARENT);
127        }
128    }
129
130    private void checkJavaVersion() throws MojoExecutionException {
131        if (javaVersion().getMajorVersion() > 17) {
132            throw new MojoExecutionException("To build native images you must set the Java target byte code level to Java 17 or below");
133        }
134    }
135
136    private void buildDockerNativeLambda() throws IOException {
137        BuildImageCmd buildImageCmd = dockerService.buildImageCmd(DockerfileMojo.DOCKERFILE_AWS_CUSTOM_RUNTIME)
138                .withBuildArg("GRAALVM_VERSION", graalVmVersion())
139                .withBuildArg("GRAALVM_JVM_VERSION", graalVmJvmVersion())
140                .withBuildArg("GRAALVM_ARCH", graalVmArch());
141
142        getLog().info("Using GRAALVM_VERSION: " + graalVmVersion());
143        getLog().info("Using GRAALVM_JVM_VERSION: " + graalVmJvmVersion());
144        getLog().info("Using GRAALVM_ARCH: " + graalVmArch());
145
146        // Starter sets the right class in pom.xml:
147        //   - For applications: io.micronaut.function.aws.runtime.MicronautLambdaRuntime
148        //   - For function apps: com.example.BookLambdaRuntime
149        getLog().info("Using CLASS_NAME: " + mainClass);
150        buildImageCmd.withBuildArg("CLASS_NAME", mainClass);
151        getNetworkMode().ifPresent(buildImageCmd::withNetworkMode);
152
153        String imageId = dockerService.buildImage(buildImageCmd);
154        File functionZip = dockerService.copyFromContainer(imageId, "/function/function.zip");
155        getLog().info("AWS Lambda Custom Runtime ZIP: " + functionZip.getPath());
156    }
157
158    private void buildDockerNative() throws IOException, InvalidImageReferenceException {
159        String dockerfileName = DockerfileMojo.DOCKERFILE_NATIVE;
160        if (Boolean.TRUE.equals(staticNativeImage)) {
161            getLog().info("Generating a static native image");
162            dockerfileName = DockerfileMojo.DOCKERFILE_NATIVE_STATIC;
163        } else if (baseImageRun.contains("distroless")) {
164            getLog().info("Generating a mostly static native image");
165            dockerfileName = DockerfileMojo.DOCKERFILE_NATIVE_DISTROLESS;
166        }
167
168        buildDockerfile(dockerfileName, true);
169    }
170
171    private void buildOracleCloud() throws IOException, InvalidImageReferenceException {
172        buildDockerfile(DockerfileMojo.DOCKERFILE_NATIVE_ORACLE_CLOUD, false);
173    }
174
175    private void buildDockerfile(String dockerfileName, boolean passClassName) throws IOException, InvalidImageReferenceException {
176        Set<String> tags = getTags();
177        for (String tag : tags) {
178            ImageReference.parse(tag);
179        }
180
181        String from = getFrom();
182        String port = getPort();
183        getLog().info("Exposing port: " + port);
184
185        File dockerfile = dockerService.loadDockerfileAsResource(dockerfileName);
186
187        if (appArguments != null && !appArguments.isEmpty()) {
188            getLog().info("Using application arguments: " + appArguments);
189            com.google.common.io.Files.asCharSink(dockerfile, Charset.defaultCharset(), FileWriteMode.APPEND).write(System.lineSeparator() + getCmd());
190        }
191
192        Map<String, String> buildImageCmdArguments = new HashMap<>();
193
194        getLog().info("Using BASE_IMAGE: " + from);
195        if (StringUtils.isNotEmpty(baseImageRun) && Boolean.FALSE.equals(staticNativeImage)) {
196            buildImageCmdArguments.put("BASE_IMAGE_RUN", baseImageRun);
197        }
198
199        if (baseImageRun.contains("alpine-glibc")) {
200            buildImageCmdArguments.put("EXTRA_CMD", "apk update && apk add libstdc++");
201        }
202
203        if (passClassName) {
204            buildImageCmdArguments.put("CLASS_NAME", mainClass);
205        }
206
207        String argsFile = mavenProject.getProperties().getProperty(ARGS_FILE_PROPERTY_NAME);
208        List<String> allNativeImageBuildArgs = MojoUtils.computeNativeImageArgs(nativeImageBuildArgs, baseImageRun, argsFile);
209        getLog().info("GraalVM native image build args: " + allNativeImageBuildArgs);
210        List<String> conversionResult = NativeImageUtils.convertToArgsFile(allNativeImageBuildArgs, Paths.get(mavenProject.getBuild().getDirectory()));
211        if (conversionResult.size() == 1) {
212            Files.delete(Paths.get(argsFile));
213
214            BuildImageCmd buildImageCmd = dockerService.buildImageCmd()
215                    .withDockerfile(dockerfile)
216                    .withTags(getTags())
217                    .withBuildArg("BASE_IMAGE", from)
218                    .withBuildArg("PORT", port);
219
220            for (Map.Entry<String, String> buildArg : buildImageCmdArguments.entrySet()) {
221                String key = buildArg.getKey();
222                String value = buildArg.getValue();
223                getLog().info("Using " + key + ": " + value);
224                buildImageCmd.withBuildArg(key, value);
225            }
226
227            getNetworkMode().ifPresent(buildImageCmd::withNetworkMode);
228            dockerService.buildImage(buildImageCmd);
229        } else {
230            throw new IOException("Unable to convert native image build args to args file");
231        }
232    }
233
234}
